display_long_description:
The servers are currently offline as we transition into the next phase of development. Thanks for playing!

Stay updated on Glassbreakers development: http://Discord.gg/polyarcgames

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ABOUT THE GAME
Glassbreakers is a real-time battler inspired by the enchanting world of Moss and Moss: Book II, where players face off in intense 1v1 matches with their hand-selected squad of Champions. Each Champion possesses a unique set of special abilities, infusing each team with its own personality and strategy. The result? An endless variety of gameplay experiences and battle scenarios where only the sharpest Glassbreakers will reign victorious over their adversaries. 

Squad Up 
Choose your combination of Champions from a growing roster of the most heroic, villainous, and notorious inhabitants from the world of Moss. Expansive cosmetics ensure your squad's swagger is distinctly your own.

Face Off
Battle against friends in private games or match with similarly skilled players in the Glassbreakers community.
